site.title: IT Tools Collection - Developer Toolbox
site.name: IT Tools Collection
site.description: Online tools collection designed for developers, including JSON formatting, text processing, encryption/decryption and other practical tools
site.keywords: developer tools,online tools,JSON tools,data conversion,text processing,frontend tools,toolbox

home.modern_design_desc: Built with shadcn/ui, supports light/dark theme switching, providing elegant user experience
home.multilingual_desc: Supports Chinese and English interfaces to meet different language preferences
home.high_performance_desc: Based on Next.js and TypeScript, providing fast and responsive user experience
home.privacy_protection_desc: All tools run on client-side, ensuring your data privacy and security

categories.json_desc: JSON data processing and validation tools

json-formatter.name: JSON Formatter
json-formatter.description: Format, validate and minify JSON data
json-formatter.output_placeholder: Formatted JSON will be displayed here...

meta.title: JSON Formatter Tool
meta.description: Online JSON formatting, compression and validation tool. Supports JSON beautification, compression and syntax validation to improve development efficiency.
meta.keywords: JSON formatter,JSON beautifier,JSON minify,JSON validator,online tool

json-to-csv.name: JSON to CSV
json-to-csv.description: Convert JSON data to CSV format
json-to-csv.placeholder: Please enter JSON data (object array or single object)...
json-to-csv.invalid_format: Please enter valid JSON object or object array
json-to-csv.output_placeholder: Converted CSV will be displayed here...
json-to-csv.usage_array_stringify: ‚Ä¢ Array values will be converted to JSON strings
json-to-csv.usage_csv_escape: ‚Ä¢ Automatically handles CSV special character escaping

meta.title: JSON to CSV Converter Tool
meta.description: Quickly convert JSON data to CSV format. Supports complex nested object processing and provides convenient data format conversion functionality.
meta.keywords: JSON to CSV,data conversion,JSON processing,CSV export,online tool

json-to-yaml.name: JSON to YAML
json-to-yaml.description: Convert JSON data to YAML format
json-to-yaml.output_placeholder: Converted YAML will be displayed here...

meta.title: JSON to YAML Converter Tool
meta.description: Quickly convert JSON data to YAML format. Supports formatted output and provides convenient configuration file conversion functionality.
meta.keywords: JSON to YAML,data conversion,JSON processing,YAML format,config conversion,online tool

json-to-xml.name: JSON to XML
json-to-xml.description: Convert JSON data to XML format
json-to-xml.input_placeholder: Please enter JSON data to convert...
json-to-xml.output_placeholder: Converted XML will be displayed here...

meta.title: JSON to XML Converter Tool
meta.description: Quickly convert JSON data to XML format. Supports custom root elements, intelligent handling of nested objects and arrays, providing convenient data format conversion functionality.
meta.keywords: JSON to XML,data conversion,JSON processing,XML format,data exchange,online tool

json-visualizer.name: JSON Visualizer
json-visualizer.description: Display JSON data in tree structure
json-visualizer.input_placeholder: Please enter JSON data to visualize...
json-visualizer.no_data: No data available, please parse JSON first

meta.title: JSON Visualizer Tool
meta.description: Display JSON data in interactive tree structure. Supports expand/collapse nodes, type identification and statistics, providing intuitive JSON data viewing experience.
meta.keywords: JSON visualizer,JSON tree structure,data visualization,JSON viewer,data analysis,online tool

json-generator.name: JSON Data Generator
json-generator.description: Generate mock JSON data for testing
json-generator.output_placeholder: Generated JSON data will be displayed here...

meta.title: JSON Data Generator Tool
meta.description: Generate mock JSON data for testing and development. Supports multiple data types, flexible field configuration, batch generation functionality to meet various testing scenario requirements.
meta.keywords: JSON generator,mock data,test data,fake data,data generation,development tools,online tool

json-diff.name: JSON Diff Comparison
json-diff.description: Compare differences between two JSON data
json-diff.detect_moves_explanation: When enabled, intelligently identifies array element position changes. When disabled, treats moves as separate delete+add operations
json-diff.delete_and_add_separately: Show delete A at index 0 and add A at index 1 separately

meta.title: JSON Diff Comparison Tool
meta.description: Deep comparison of differences between two JSON data. Provides detailed difference analysis reports with visual display to help quickly locate data changes.
meta.keywords: JSON diff,JSON comparison,data comparison,version comparison,difference analysis,code comparison,online tool

base64-encoder-decoder.description: Base64 string encoding and decoding tool

meta.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder Tool
meta.description: Online Base64 encoding and decoding tool. Convert text to/from Base64 strings for data transmission, API calls, and development scenarios.

url-encoder-decoder.name: URL Encoder/Decoder
url-encoder-decoder.description: URL string encoding and decoding tool
url-encoder-decoder.placeholder: Enter URL or text to encode/decode...

meta.title: URL Encoder/Decoder Tool
meta.description: Online URL encoding and decoding tool. Handle URL parameters and special character escaping with encodeURIComponent format support for frontend development.

password-generator.name: Password Generator
password-generator.description: Generate secure and reliable random passwords
password-generator.no_charset: Please select at least one character type
password-generator.tip1_desc: Recommend using passwords with 12+ characters, longer is more secure
password-generator.tip2_desc: Recommend including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers and symbols
password-generator.tip3_desc: Change passwords regularly, avoid using the same password for multiple accounts
password-generator.tip4_desc: Use password managers to store passwords securely, avoid plain text recording

meta.title: Password Generator
meta.description: Online secure password generator. Support custom length and character sets to generate high-strength random passwords for account security.
meta.keywords: password generator,random password,secure password,password strength,account security,online tool

aes-encrypt-decrypt.name: AES Encrypt/Decrypt
aes-encrypt-decrypt.input_placeholder: Enter text to encrypt or decrypt...
aes-encrypt-decrypt.missing_input_key_iv: Please enter data, key and IV
aes-encrypt-decrypt.decrypt_failed: Decryption failed, please check data and key
aes-encrypt-decrypt.tip1_desc: AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) is one of the most secure symmetric encryption algorithms
aes-encrypt-decrypt.tip2_desc: Key length is 32 characters (256 bits), please keep the key secure
aes-encrypt-decrypt.tip3_desc: IV increases encryption randomness, use different IV for each encryption
aes-encrypt-decrypt.tip4_desc: All encryption/decryption is performed locally, data is not uploaded to servers

meta.title: AES Encrypt/Decrypt Tool
meta.description: Online AES encryption/decryption tool. Support AES-256-CBC mode for secure data encryption and decryption.
meta.keywords: AES encryption,AES decryption,symmetric encryption,data encryption,information security,online tool

rsa-encrypt-decrypt.name: RSA Encrypt/Decrypt
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.input_placeholder: Enter text to encrypt or decrypt...
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.public_key_placeholder: Enter or generate RSA public key...
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.private_key_placeholder: Enter or generate RSA private key...
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.missing_input_key: Please enter data and public key
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.missing_input_public_key: Please enter data and public key
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.missing_input_private_key: Please enter data and private key
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.encrypt_failed: Encryption failed, please check data and public key
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.decrypt_failed: Decryption failed, please check data and private key
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.placeholder: Enter text to encrypt or decrypt...
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.tip1_desc: RSA is a secure asymmetric encryption algorithm, encrypt with public key, decrypt with private key
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.tip2_desc: Recommend using 2048-bit or higher key size for better security
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.tip3_desc: RSA encryption has data size limitations, for large data consider AES+RSA combination
rsa-encrypt-decrypt.tip4_desc: Private key must be kept strictly confidential, public key can be shared openly

meta.title: RSA Encrypt/Decrypt Tool
meta.description: Online RSA encryption/decryption tool. Support key pair generation, public key encryption and private key decryption for secure data transmission.
meta.keywords: RSA encryption,RSA decryption,asymmetric encryption,public key encryption,private key decryption,digital signature,online tool

hmac-generator.name: HMAC Generator
hmac-generator.description: HMAC message authentication code generation tool
hmac-generator.data_placeholder: Enter message data to generate HMAC...
hmac-generator.missing_input_key: Please enter message data and secret key
hmac-generator.tip1_desc: HMAC is based on hash functions and secret key, provides message integrity and authentication
hmac-generator.tip2_desc: Recommend using SHA-256 or higher strength algorithms
hmac-generator.tip3_desc: HMAC security depends on the confidentiality of the secret key
hmac-generator.tip4_desc: Commonly used for API signatures, JWT verification, data integrity verification

meta.title: HMAC Generator
meta.description: Online HMAC generation tool. Support multiple hash algorithms to generate message authentication codes for data integrity and identity verification.
meta.keywords: HMAC generator,message authentication code,hash algorithm,data integrity,identity verification,API signature,online tool
